import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Footer from './Footer'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import './ManageChains.css'; const ManageChains = () => { const [chains, setChains] = useState([]); const togglePanel = () => { document.getElementById('slidePanel').classList.toggle('active'); }; useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8080/chains/all') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setChains(data)) .catch(err => console.error("Failed to fetch chains", err)); }, []); return (

); }; export default ManageChains;
